Title: F# Project Extender
Description: Installing F# Project Extender provides tools to better organize files in F# projects by allowing project subdirectories and separating file management in Solution Explorer from controlling compilation order.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Installing F# Project Extender provides tools to better organize files in F# projects by allowing project subdirectories and separating file management in Solution Explorer from controlling compilation order.

Look here for more details on how to use it and here for the explanation of how it works.

Also this post explains what prompted me to start this project
